value.title: AI appears more human on social media than actual humans: study

value.title: State of IT report: Generative AI will soon go mainstream, say 9 out of 10 IT leaders
value.excerpt: Generative AI has only recently become mainstream. The report shows 86% of IT leaders believe generative AI will have a prominent role it their organization in the near future. Yet 64% of IT leaders are concerned about the ethics of generative AI, and 62% are concerned about its impacts on their careers.
